name: user-service
description: The user microservice provides authentication and user profile management capabilities

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && aws cloudformation package --template-file infrastructure/template.yaml --output-template-file build/infrastructure.packaged.yaml --s3-bucket foobarfizzbuzz
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/infrastructure.packaged.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name foobar --parameter-overrides Environment=development
